snippet.title: Pampas & Selene: The Maze of Demons | Official EN Trailer | Unepic Games
snippet.description:
Pampas & Selene: The Maze of Demons takes everything you love about classic metroidvanias and brings them together with a cooperative, modern twist! Join Pampas and Selene as they collect powerful artifacts, overcome monsters, demons, and a vengeful evil with the help of the gods themselves!

Play solo or with full split-screen and remote co-op support as you traverse a massive castle with over 200 rooms to explore! Unlock 40+ unique weapons, items, and more, all while collecting the souls of your enemies to use against them in battle!

This retro game is a loving tribute to an MSX2 masterpiece from Francisco Téllez de Meneses, the creator of UnMetal, Ghost 1.0, and UnEpic.

Purchase now on Steam: https://s.team/a/1966220
Join Our Discord: https://discord.gg/JgMM3Gg54P
